DOC.brief_summary: The study aim evaluate efficacy safety GRC 8200 type 2 diabetes mellitus patient . The study involve six week wash period two week run period patient currently mono-therapy two week run period drug naïve patient . This placebo control study . One five treatment arm placebo . The duration treatment 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study GRC 8200 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Male female patient ≥30 year age At screening , females nonchildbearing potential female childbearing potential adequate contraception Has establish clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus least 3 month prior screen period Is treat diabetes either diet exercise alone , monotherapy antidiabetic drug Has HbA1c value screen 6.5 % 10 % Has type 1 diabetes Is female lactate pregnant Has history acute metabolic diabetic complication Has clinically significant disease type 2 diabetes mellitus
